com.google.inject.tools.suite.module
Interface ModuleContextRepresentation

All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationModuleContextRepresentation, CustomModuleContextRepresentation
public interface ModuleContextRepresentation

Representation of a module context in the user's code.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)

Nested Class Summary
static class ModuleContextRepresentation.ModuleInstanceRepresentation
          Representation of an instance of a Module in the user's code, including which constructor to use and how to use it.

Method Detail

findLocation

CodeLocation findLocation(java.lang.String theClass,
                          java.lang.String annotatedWith)
Find the location in code where a binding occurs in this module context.

Parameters:
theClass - the class to find the binding for
annotatedWith - the annotations on this class to find bindings for
Returns:
the location in code and/or problems finding the binding

java.util.Set<CodeLocation> findLocations(java.lang.String theClass)

Parameters:
theClass - the class to find bindings for
Returns:
the locations in code and/or problems in finding bindings
